section.name: DPML Support
section.p: The DPML provides a dedicated Support Mailing Lists that is actively monitored by the DPML community.

section.name: Professional Services
section.p: OSM provides professional services related to Java based component management solutions. These services include:

ul.li: consulting services related to product architecture and planning
migration strategy development and operational support

section.p: For additional information you can reach OSM on info@osm.net.
